aboutText: TechSearchMK can be used to query and aggregate results from Macedonian tech sites (currently Setec, Anhoch and Technomarket).
prefixText: You can prefix your searches to refine the results. A "+" prefix ensures each result has the keyword, while a "-" prefix ensures the keyword does not appear.
ossText: TechSearchMK is free and open-source software. It's source code can be found at
